title: Southern Showdown
text: Southern Showdown was a two-day <a href="professional%20wrestling">professional wrestling</a> event promoted by <a href="New%20Japan%20Pro-Wrestling">New Japan Pro-Wrestling</a> (NJPW). It took place on 29 and 30 June 2019 at the <a href="Festival%20Hall%20%28Melbourne%29">Festival Hall</a> in <a href="Melbourne">Melbourne</a>, <a href="Victoria%20%28Australia%29">Victoria</a>, <a href="Australia">Australia</a> and the <a href="UNSW%20Venues%23The%20Roundhouse">UNSW Roundhouse</a> in <a href="Sydney">Sydney</a>, <a href="New%20South%20Wales">New South Wales</a>, Australia. The Melbourne event was streamed live on <a href="FITE%20TV">FITE TV</a> and was made available for <a href="Video%20on%20demand">on demand</a> viewing on <a href="New%20Japan%20Pro-Wrestling%20World">NJPW World</a> 72 hours later.
